data.name: RPG Sounds - Woodenhorn Clan - Sound Pack
data.detailed_description:
Woodenhorn Clan is an RPG Sounds pack of looping music and SFX. It includes:

Music
  • Horn Destruction
  • Snort Massacre
  • Minotaur Stomp

SFX
  • Battle Axe Miss (4)
  • Battle Axe Throw (4)
  • Hyena Attack (4)
  • Hyena Laugh (4)
  • Minotaur Battle Scream (4)
  • Minotaur Battle Call (1)
  • Minotaur Buffing Training (1)
  • Minotaur Training Court (1)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 capabilities

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 capabilities
